text: Ærest of wiðibroce in gates hoh.
Of gates ho in sand wællan, & of sand wællan in deope wællan.
Of deope wællan in heador, of heodore on þa greata lindan.
And of þan greata lindan þæt in mær bæc, of mærbæce in arwan stream.
And of arwan in in mær broc, of mærbroce on cristel mæl ac.
Of cristelmælac in cloddes læhge, of cloddes læhge in cloddes wællan.
Of cloddes wællan in þa styfecinge, of þære styfecingge in mersc hrycges hege.
And æfter þam hege in þæcsic, & of þam sice on ealhmundes byrigenne.
And of þære byrigene in ælflæde brycge.
Of ælflæde brycge in to þære ufere læhge, & of ufere læhge in martines mædwe.
Of þære mædwe to bridene brycge, of britene brycge into hine gemære to þam holan broce.
And swa andlang broces eft in wiðibroc.
